prompts: Create a vibrant Electric-type Pokemon with spikes and a musical theme.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon that emits colorful energy, radiating coolness.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of sound and electric power.
Generate an edgy Electric/Poison type with a rebellious attitude and striking colors.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it belongs in a rock concert environment.
Give me a character that embodies the essence of electricity and punk rock.
Make a Pokemon with an electrifying appearance and a unique personality.

distinctive_features: Musical notes or sound wave patterns
